actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on mixtures of 2,4,-dinitro-6-octyl phenyl crotonate, 2,6-dinitro-4-octyl phenyl crotonate and nitrooctyl phenols (dinocap), and on mixtures of dinocap with application adjuvants.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duties on mixtures of 2,4,-dinitro-6-octyl phenyl crotonate, 2,6-dinitro-4-octyl phenyl crotonate and nitrooctyl phenols (dinocap) and application adjuvants.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on mixtures of 2,4,-dinitro-6-octyl phenyl crotonate, 2,6-dinitro-4-octyl phenyl crotonate and nitrooctyl phenols (dinocap), and on mixtures of dinocap with application adjuvants.
